tourBios.carHigh:
2015: Started Tour season with a T16 at the PC Financial Open, the first of three top 25s...Next top 25 (T16) came at the Staal Foundation Open in July...Two weeks later, shot rounds of 68-67-69-67 to claim T23 at the ATB Financial Classic.

2014: Made 10 cuts in 12 events with five top 25s. Finished T21 at The Players Cup in July...At the ATB Financial Classic at Sirocco GC, shot 68-68-68-67 to claim T13...At the Wildfire Invitational, four under-par rounds resulted in a T16-finish...Finished the season with a pair of T24s at the Cape Breton Classic and Tour Championship in September. Finished 50th on the Order of Merit.

2013: T3 at PGA TOUR Qualifying School in Canada to earn exempt status. Posted one top-10 finish in nine starts, a T10 at The Syncrude Boreal Open. Finished 53rd on season-ending Order of Merit to remain exempt for 2014. 

2012: Played in The Honda Classic and the Memorial Tournament on the PGA TOUR, missing the cut in both starts.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Honorable Mention All-American (2009) at Ohio State and a Midwest all-region selection (2009 and 2011). First-team All-Big Ten (2009 and 2011) and a second-team All-Big Ten selection in 2008. Received the Big Ten Sportsmanship Award in 2009. Two-time Big Ten Golfer of the Week selection (Feb. 25, 2009; March 11, 2009) and a three-time Academic All-Big Ten honoree (2009, 2010 and 2011)...Four-time Ohio State Scholar-Athlete (2008-11).
tourBios.personal: Biggest thrill outside golf is watching the Ohio State Buckeyes defeat the Michigan Wolverines...Favorite courses are Pine Valley and Seminole…Dream foursome would include Arnold Palmer, Fred Couples and Jack Nicklaus...Involved in a charitable capacity with the Nationwide Children's Hospital in Columbus...Favorite book is Freakonomics...Includes driving a lap at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway on his bucket list…Grandfather played golf at Ohio State.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Mackenzie Tour-PGA T was T10th in 2013 at the The Syncrude Boreal Open Presented by AECON.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks T61st in Scoring Average (Actual) on the Mackenzie Tour-PGA TOUR Canada.
